name: Got My Dude
description:
This is a protoype for the game made espicailly for
Game Zanga 5
wait for the full version at the end of this week
and we have a special thanks to Corgi Engine
who helped us in creatin this game
your support means alot to us gives as hope and passion
to continue making games special thanks to
Game Zanga
and wait for the full version which contains 6 new
levels in water and in sky and 2 bonus levels and
a boss fight and many other items like Time
pickup and many other things stay tuned.

made by : Mohamed ElTorky , Omar Ali ; MO Co.
